Name: Empty Sharp
About the game: Play the part of Rosalie , a wicked girl forced to take a long journey due to an unexpected tragedy. Leave Lanya capital and go searching yourself; ask mysterious entities, dark creatures and mere humans to find a way to heal. Game features : - Visual Novel style dialogues . - The story's development depends on your choices . - Explore many cities and cultures through the 2.5D side-scrolling map . - Challenge many different platform sections , among flooded holds, buried crypts, snow-capped peaks. - Solve numerous puzzles to continue on your journey. - Pick the collectables to reconstruct the past of the young Rosalie . - 5 Chapters ; every chapter has two endings. - 2 Ultimate endings of the game . The game contains : - Pixel-arted sprites and game objects. - Hand drawn and digitally coloured characters' models . - 23 Written, drawn and dubbed cutscenes . - Original and remixed soundtrack. - Handmade and digitally designed backdrops and graphic effects . The fate of the unfortunate Rosalie and the life and death of other characters are in your hands; your choices can tip the balance in favour of light or darkness, but only the end will tell you the truth. All of this in Empty Sharp !
